Label:
### Settle via consent order

If the parties have settled and a consent order is ready, please click cancel to return to the claim summary screen and select 'Make an application' from the 'Next steps' menu and select 'Settle by consent'.

### Settle by way of Part 36 Acceptance

 If you have settle by way of Part 36 acceptance, please contact the hearing centre or court that is dealing with this claim.

### Mark claim as paid in full

If the claim has been paid in full, click 'Continue' below.
Does marking this claim as paid in full relate to all claimants?
Select the claimant this relates to
How has the claim been settled?
